overview: A rich but unscrupulous old woman plots with a scientist to have her brain implanted in the skull of a sexy young woman.
tagline: WANTED: Youth and Beauty. Will Pay Millions. Only Beautiful and Shapely Girls Need Apply. No References Required. Appointments After Dark Only.
cast: Marjorie Eaton|Frank Gerstle|Frank Fowler|Erika Peters|Judy Bamber
